title: Crypto Market Frightened by Calm
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation plummeted below $3.9 trillion on Monday morning, which is 4% lower than the previous day. Among the top altcoins, Bitcoin is losing less than others, while SushiSwap (-13%) and Dogecoin (-11%) lead the list of outsiders.
